reviews.title: A wonderful experience
text: We had a wonderful experience, Mike advise was great and he is always responsive. He advised three different camps in Botswana (2) and Zambia (1) which gave diffenent experiences and where a great combination. This is my 3rd safari and although nothing can compete with the first experience (also organized by Mike) and every day is different with something new from wild dog, lions  walking through the delta, lions and leopards up trees.,

reviews.title: Trip of a lifetime
text: Great choices of camps for our incredible Safari. Wilderness in Botswana and Rwanda were amazing, as was the Okavango Explorers Camp in Selinda Reserve and the Africa Bush Camp in Lower Lolebezi. The guides, the animals, the accommodations were all top notch

reviews.title: South African Safari Trip
text: The trip was simply amazing.  During the planning stage we worked closely with Mike from Safari &Company in order to best co-ordinate our desire to obtain the best possible holiday experience, safari activities given our budget.  The safari experience at two lodges in Kruger and other activities in Cape Town and the wine country exceeded all our expectations and everything was professionally executed.  In short we had a wonderful time.  Hotels selected and activities recommended were toally awesome.

reviews.title: Amazing experience
text: I had a conference in Durban and it was recommended to me to use Safari & Company to make all the arrangements for my wife and I to attend the conference and combine it with a safari. The result was an amazing experience that went beyond our expectations. We were provided first class treatment, including transfers, accommodations and an incredible time at &Beyond Phinda and Ngala Lodges. I highly recommend using Safari & Co.

reviews.title: Four different safari lodges in/around the Okavango Delta as well as side trips he helped coordinate.
text: I am sure I will sound like Mike Haine's mother as this review will be so glowing!!!  Every word here is the truth.  Mike put together a trip so flawless, so perfectly executed, so exactly what we asked for.  I can't say enough, communicate enough appreciation for him.  Not a single screw up or problem over a month's time.  Prior to the start of a trip, I find the real professionals rise - or FALL to the occasion.  This is always their litmus test as far as I am concerned, but by then it might be too late - they have your money.  NOT with Safari and Co.  The company and Mike Haines return your  calls promptly, return emails and texts, answer all issues, (I was not as computer literate as many of his guests are I'm sure!) but he was right there - every step of the way.  His gentle nudges to remind me to do something prior to the trip were always helpful. I don't want to sound as if I am bragging, believe me when I say this, but I have traveled all over the world and this trip was one of our TOP THREE.  Mike and his team offer the total experience, plying you with packing suggestions, descriptions of your lodging, truths about the culture, the food, overviews of the city, the entire package.  I was so well versed as to what I needed I lacked for nothing on this trip - and we were gone for one month.  Africa for a month was a dream come true, although this was not our first African trip.  But it was our first with Michael after he was referred by good friends currently on their 8th trip with him.  NOW THAT IS A TRUE RECOMMENDATION.  Many agents say they "know Africa," but few live Africa as Mike does, checking the lodges he books, keeping up with new places and rechecking places he refers his guests to.  He is African and knows the continent well.  You can not go wrong with this company.  See, I told you this review was glowing - and I meant every sentence!!!   If Africa is on YOUR bucket list, this is the man to call.

reviews.title: What An Amazing Adventure!
text: What an adventure we experienced thank you to Michael Haines! We started in Capetown for four nights, then flew to northern South Africa for a six night safari. From here we flew to Windhoek, Namibia to continue our adventure at Camp Sossus and the famous sand dunes, back to Windhoek, and finally ended in Zimbabwe to experience Victoria Falls. Every aspect of this adventure was as predicted, over the top amazing! The tour guides were so friendly and knowledgable. The food was outstanding! The accommodations were 5 star! We have nothing but very positive comments to say about our trip and the planning details that Michael arranged for us. We look forward to our next adventure with Safari and Company. Thank you again Michael for your attention to detail from all aspects of this trip! We thoroughly enjoyed every minute of it! Sandy and Barry.

reviews.title: Fantastic Safari Experience
text: Mike was referred to me by a relative who used Safari and Company years ago for their Safari adventure. From the minute I contacted Mike he was professional, friendly, helpful and provided all of the information, details and costs for the various Safaris. He helped with all of the planning and provided a comprehensive itinerary for our 18 day trip to South Africa, Zambia and Botswana. Everything was very well organized and all of the pick ups, flights and accommodations were exactly as planned and presented as per the itinerary. I was extremely impressed with the level of planning and the whole trip was awesome and amazing thanks to Mike and Safari and Company. I have no hesitation recommending Mike for your next trip plans.

reviews.title: Best Trip & Great Safari Company!
text: We had an amazing time in Tanzania and Kenya, and owe it to Mike for putting together such a great itinerary! Mike was very communicative and professional, and checked in on us throughout our trip. The accommodations and flow of the trip were outstanding. Can't wait to book our next trip!

reviews.title: Truly amazing safari trip experience
text: We visited 4 beautiful safari camps in Botswana - each providing a unique experience and different nature viewing. All guides were highly knowledgeable and professional. Saw so many animals and birds - all truly exciting. All transfers between camps were well organized and on time. Spent 2 days in Victoria Falls - another amazing experience at Old Drift.  Mike and Safari & Company provided excellent assistance and support in organizing our trip.  Highly recommend Safari & Co to put together a trip of a lifetime.

reviews.title: African Adventure - Namibia by Road - Botswana by Air
text: We adventured to Namibia doing an overland/driving trip to see the dunes, ocean, and surprisingly plentiful wildlife. the guide was terrific.
We then flew to Botswana and explored it via three camps. All were special and the connecting short flights - including a helicopter - were fun and a good way to see the region from 1500 ft up.
The accommodations were all excellent as was the service and copious amount of food and drink. Camp staff and guides are key elements to a special trip - every single one delivered.
Chris & Luba Mifflin
Collingwood, Canada

reviews.title: Great trips!
text: This is the second time we have used Safari and Co. -the first to South Africa and Zimbabwe and this recent trip to Morocco. Mike paid careful attention to what we wanted and responded to our wishes. We would definitely use him again.

reviews.title: Incredible and thoughtful planning and service from Safari & co
text: Safari & Co really takes their time to understand what you are truly looking to get from the trip and then delivers beyond that! For both our African safari trip and South America trip, they ensured we got an incredible and unique trip that created memories of a lifetime

reviews.title: Trip of a life time
text: I travelled on Safari and Co March to April 2023. This is my second safari with this co. This trip was amazing. I am 75 year old female with a disability and require a CPAP machine to sleep. Every detail was taken care of. I was met on arrival at each destination, got assistance with my bags and taken to the next step. I was booked into a variety of camps to get the full experience. all my dietary needs were met. At one camp a fully charged battery was in my room when i arrived for the CPAP machine because that camp ran on a generator. I went to 4 countries, 3 of which was for safari and Victoria Falls. I had all the visas and paper work as per Michael's instructions, all of which made immigrations, that much easier. Last but not least, he walked me through getting an app on my phone that had my day to day itinerary with notes for each day.

reviews.title: Amazing African Adventure
text: We travelled on safari with Safari & Co back in 2007. The immediate dream after that was to go again! So we did. This time we went with another couple. Mike Haines did just as well this time in orchestrating our trip. It was so simple for us... with not a glitch in transfers, accommodation, flights etc. The itinerary app was the best. The camps and hotels were excellent and so fitting to each location, food delicious, and I don't think anywhere else makes you feel as welcome.  Oh, and all the wonderful animals!!! The excellent guides who drove us seemed to know just where the animals would be...zebra, giraffe, lions, leopard, cheeta, hippopotamus, baboon, ostrich even a rhino in the distance. We do travel as much as possible, and Safari & Co has been our benchmark. No other independant travel provider has been better, but this time they may just have surpassed themselves!

reviews.title: Safari dreams coming true
text: I contacted Mike and told him what I wanted, and he did the rest.  I stayed in 4 different camps in different parts of Tanzania, and had 4 unique experiences.  I was picked up and looked after every step of the way.  As an older female travelling on my own, I never had a  moment of worry.

The safari experience was amazing.  I saw lions, cheetahs, leopards, elephants, giraffes, zebras, gnus, rhinos, hippos, and the list just goes on.  The game drives were varied, and the guides were all first class.  I stayed in everything from a tent to a Masai like room.
I learned a lot about Tanzania, a little Swahili, and developed a greater appreciation for our amazing planet.  I highly recommend this company to anyone looking to go on Safari.

reviews.title: Great memories in Africa
text: My wife and I travelled with another couple to Africa with Safari & Company in February/March 2023 and had a wonderful time. We spent a week in Tanzania staying at lodges and tent camps, then spent 2 days at Victoria Falls in Zambia, followed by another 5 days in Botswana at safari tent camps. All parts of the trip were well coordinated by Safari & Co, with friendly, personable, and knowledgeable guides at every stop along the way. Accommodations were top notch and staff at each location made our stay relaxing and memorable. All elements of the trip were detailed in a very helpful app which allowed us to know what to expect at each step along the way, and all parts of the trip went exactly as planned. Kudos to Mike and Safari & Co. for a well organized trip, and ensuring we had a memorable trip.

reviews.title: Amazing Zimbabwe
text: Great experience. Mike set up everything and I couldn't have planned it better myself. All accommodations and activities were beyond expectations.  I have spent a lot of time in Africa and have been all over the continent going the solo budget backpacker route. Being older and with my family I needed something a bit more "upscale". One thing you worry about going this route is a loss of authenticity but I can assure you this was not a problem. If you are worried about the package tours where you get off a bus with 40 others for a quick photo in front of some landmark you need not worry. Mike provides the real deal.

reviews.title: Trip of a lifetime!
text: We were a group of 8, travelling to Capetown, SA, spending 5 days there and then flying to Maun, Botswana as a starting point for a 13-day safari trip - 4 camps in Botswana and 1 in Zimbabwe. All logistics went off without a hitch, thanks to Safari & Co's excellent contacts and planning. Mike at Safari&Co provided accurate info about each camp and we were delighted with the accommodations, activities, food and staff at each camp. The guides in particular were fabulous; their knowledge of animal and bird species was superb. This is a trip where you need experts setting things up.

reviews.title: Cairo Egypt
text: Great private tours...guide and driver were very professional. I would easily recommend Safari & Company to my friends and family.

reviews.title: A trip back to Africa
text: Mike arranged for us to visit camps in Kenya and Tanzania and the driver/guides we had in both countries were excellent.  We were able to see everything on our bucket list, and loved revisiting the Africa of our youth.  The camps were comfortable and staffed by wonderful, cheerful people who never stopped tying to be helpful.  It was time and money well-spent.

reviews.title: Fabulous Botswana, Zimbabwe experience.
text: In 2022 we decided to go on safari in Botswana and Zimbabwe in September 2023.  Safari & Company proposed an itinerary for us that ended up being perfect.  We spent 4 nights at Little Sable and 3 nights at Little DumaTau in Botswana and 4 nights at Linkwasha in  Zimbabwe.  We finished with 2 nights in Victoria Falls.  All 3 camps were great, the guides, the staff, the accommodations and the food.  Little DumaTau was an upgrade because an elephant damaged the camp we were supposed to go to the week before.  Safari & Company arranged everything for us including all our flights and airport transfers. We were looked after every step of the way.  Our African trip was fabulous.

reviews.title: Botswana and Zimbabwe Safari
text: Our recent safari was outstanding! Mike from Safari and co. arranged everything for us, and we were well taken care of. We were met at airports and escorted to our charter flights and/or accommodations ( which was such a relief) Our Wilderness Safari camps were amazing. Especially Little Duma Tau, it was a special place. I most definitely would recommend Mike at Safari and co to look after all your planning needs for your Safari.

reviews.title: Trip of a Lifetime - Simply Amazing
text: Amazing Trip. We contacted Michael at Safari and Co and asked him to put together a trip to South Africa where we would be able to see all of the animals, but with a preference for big cats. He put a proposal together for three private reserves as we didn’t want one where 40 vehicles all show up at the same time and you can’t see much. He recommended MalaMala (located within Krueger but a private, separate reserve) and then two reserves in Botswana (Kwando Lagoon and Kwara). These were all amazing. A max of two or three vehicles allowed at one sighting so plenty of opportunity to get amazing photos and up close sightings (my wife got more than 6000 photos - we have a LOT to go through - lol). Incredible sighting of lion prides with 8 small cubs, leopard sightings including one female who took her Impala kill up a tree to secure it from other predators (right in front of us), two male cheetahs with a zebra kill and so much more. We saw the big 5 all in one day at MalaMala. The accommodations were beyond impressive. There are so many things I could put down here but you have to see it to believe it. A must do on anyones bucket list. My wife travelled to Africa 5 yrs ago with our daughter and Michael arranged the trip for them. That is why we went back to him for this trip, and we will definitely be going back again with Michael’s expertise helping to plan the next trip.

reviews.title: Abundant Wildlife and Treasured Friendships
text: Having been to East Africa for work, my hope was to see Kenya in ways I haven't been able to previously - enjoying a few of their National Parks - Amboseli and Masai Mara. We added in Bwindi Impenetrable Forest to see the Mountain Gorillas.

Because of long range planning, I started talking with Mike about this trip 5 years ago - and then we waited because of COVID.  I enjoyed working with Mike because he let me be involved in the planning of the trip - I told him where and for how long I wanted to spend in each location - and he did the rest.

He planned an amazing trip. Each location was unique and offered something the other didn't. We saw abundant wild life in Amboseli within the confines of a smaller park - elephants galore, lions after a kill, hippo in close range. Masai Mara showed off vast beautiful vistas. An amazing tented experience with breakfast and lunch in the bush. And Buhoma Lodge was the perfect location for Gorilla trekking, a hike to 3 waterfalls, and treasured friendships with the local community.
Mike's planning, attentiveness and care - enabled us to experience East Africa in ways we couldn't have imagined. Well done! We highly recommend him to plan your African Safari experience.

reviews.title: Amazing trip! Best itinerary!
text: What a life changing trip with our two teenage boys! Truly an incredible itinerary, thoughtfully curated to suit our needs! From Lake Manyara, Nogorogoro Crater to the Serengeti, each lodge/tented camp was unique and special in their own ways. The guides provided were knowledgeable and teachers for all of us!

reviews.title: Perfection in Kenya 2023
text: Mike Haines (Safari & Company) has done it again!  This is the second amazing trip he has put together flawlessly, first was in Tanzania in 2019 (17 days) and now in Kenya 2023 (21 days). When you are on safari you are reliant on your agent to have thought and planned everything out, not only does he do this flawlessly from the minute you land he finds ways to truly provide service above your expectations.  The people he works with in the countries you visit are professional but more importantly warm, engaging, and caring individuals which ensures a wonderful time – always leaving with more friends than you landed with. He is knowledgeable and patient as he puts together a personalized itinerary. He knows how to make sure you are at the right place at the right time coming home with amazing memories counting down the days until you can reach out to him to do it again.  I would highly recommend Mike and Safari & Company. Mike are you ready for round 3 – Egypt here we come!
Connie & Daniel
Caledon, Ontario Canada

reviews.title: Okavango Delta - Botswana
text: Booked with Mike from Safar and Co. and he made everything as easy as possible. I asked for what I wanted and Mike delivered.
I was worried about the airport in Johannesburg but Mike arranged for a rep to deliver us the hotel from the plane.

We stayed at Thamo Telele for the next two nights to recover from the plane rides and refuel. Excellent opportunity to learn about giraffe conservation in Botswana as resident researchers were in house. Accommodations were superb.
Our safaris were booked with Duke's Camp, Kanana and Gomoti Plains.
All excellent animal viewing in jeeps with either 4 or 6 people.  The food was great. I liked Kanana the best!
The small planes from Mack Air and Wilderness were awesome with great pilots.
Would use Mike and Safari and Company for all Africa travel.

reviews.title: Safari & Company - Excellent
text: The trip was great, the itinerary was flawless, Michael did a great job, answered all our questions and the 2 camps he booked were terrific, Nottens Bush Camp in SA and Kwara Camp in Botswana. No issues at all. We had him book the internal flights as well.
